Title: Rango
Actors: Johnny Depp, Isla Fisher, Timothy Olyphant
Plot: Rango is an ordinary chameleon who accidentally winds up in the town of Dirt, a lawless outpost in the Wild West in desperate need of a new sheriff.

Title: Twilight
Actors: Kristen Stewart, Robert Pattinson, Billy Burke
Plot: When Bella Swan moves to a small town in the Pacific Northwest, she falls in love with Edward Cullen, a mysterious classmate who reveals himself to be a 108-year-old vampire.

Title: Casablanca
Actors: Humphrey Bogart, Ingrid Bergman, Paul Henreid
Plot: A cynical expatriate American cafe owner struggles to decide whether or not to help his former lover and her fugitive husband escape the Nazis in French Morocco.

Title: Challengers
Plot: Tashi, a former tennis prodigy turned coach, transformed her husband into a champion. But to overcome a recent losing streak and redeem himself, he'll need to face off against his former best friend and Tashi's ex-boyfriend.

Title: Alien
Actors: Sigourney Weaver, Tom Skerritt, John Hurt
Plot: After investigating a mysterious transmission of unknown origin, the crew of a commercial spacecraft encounters a deadly lifeform.

Title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
Actors: Elijah Wood, Ian McKellen, Orlando Bloom
Plot: A meek Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the powerful One Ring and save Middle-earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.
Country: New Zealand, United States, United Kingdom
